item.title: 英伟达业绩公布前股价上涨；日本央行上田几乎未给出利率暗示
item.description: 本周伊始，全球股市在英伟达（Nvidia）发布备受期待的财报之前表现较为稳健，而日本央行行长的讲话则让市场对该国的利率前景一无所知。【原文：Global stocks began the week on firmer footing ahead of a highly anticipated earnings release from Nvidia , while in Japan, a speech from its central bank's head left markets none the wiser on the country's rate outlook.】

item.title: 俄乌紧张局势升级后油价走高
item.description: 俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的战事在上周末加剧后，油价在周一有所上扬，但对全球第二大消费国中国燃料需求的担忧以及对全球石油过剩的预测对市场构成了压力。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Monday after fighting between Russia and Ukraine intensified over the weekend, although concerns about fuel demand in China, the world's second-largest consumer, and forecasts of a global oil surplus weighed on markets.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，特朗普增加了更多财政部长候选人
item.description: 据《纽约时报》和《华尔街日报》周日报道，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将前美联储理事凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）和亿万富翁马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）列入财政部长候选人名单。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump added former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh and billionaire Marc Rowan to the list of candidates to become his Treasury secretary, the New York Times and Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 日本央行暂缓加息，美元兑日元走强
item.description: 美元兑日元周一上涨，此前日本最高央行行长表示将进一步收紧政策，但对时机问题保持开放态度，使市场无法更明确地判断是否会在下个月采取行动。【原文：The dollar rose against the yen on Monday after Japan's top central banker flagged further policy tightening ahead but left open the question of timing, leaving the market no clearer on whether a move would come next month.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿里巴巴旨在通过双币种债券交易融资 50 亿美元
item.description: 据两位直接知情的消息人士透露，中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团正计划通过多期美元和离岸人民币债券融资 50 亿美元。【原文：Chinese ecommerce giant Alibaba Group is aiming to raise $5 billion in multi-tranche dollar and offshore Chinese yuan bonds, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美元稳坐钓鱼台，日元熊市警惕日本央行鹰派
item.description: 周一，由于国债收益率高企和美国降息前景更加谨慎，美元有望延续牛市走势，但干预风险导致美元兑日元回落。【原文：The dollar was looking to extend its bull run on Monday as lofty Treasury yields and a more restrained outlook for U.S. rate cuts burnished its attractiveness, though the risk of intervention had caused a pullback against the yen.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构起诉 NAB 违反经济困难法
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管部门周一对澳大利亚第二大银行澳大利亚国民银行启动了民事处罚程序，原因是该银行未能在法定时限内对数百份经济困难申请作出回应。【原文：Australia's corporate watchdog on Monday launched civil penalty proceedings against National Australia Bank , the country's second-largest lender, for failing to respond to hundreds of financial hardship applications within the legally mandated time frame.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴市场条件收紧，资金外流加剧
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 菲律宾启动利率掉期市场以提高债券流动性
item.description: 菲律宾央行周一宣布启动一个利率掉期市场，该市场以新确立的基准利率为基础，以加强债券市场的交易和流动性。【原文：The Philippine central bank announced the launch on Monday of an interest rate swaps market anchored to a newly established benchmark rate to enhance bond market trading and liquidity.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Nvidia 新款人工智能芯片面临服务器过热问题
item.description: 据《信息》周日报道，英伟达（Nvidia）的新款 Blackwell AI 芯片已经面临延期，并遇到了配套服务器过热的问题，导致一些客户担心他们没有足够的时间让新的数据中心投入运行。【原文：Nvidia's new Blackwell AI chips, which have already faced delays, have encountered problems with accompanying servers that overheat, causing some customers to worry they will not have enough time to get new data centers up and running, the Information reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 数据显示，在切断奥地利天然气供应后，俄罗斯在欧洲转售了更多天然气
item.description: 公司和消息来源称，由于价格争议，俄罗斯输往奥地利的天然气在周日中断了第二天，但欧洲的其他买家介入抢购未售出的天然气，数据也显示了这一点。【原文：Russian gas flows to Austria were suspended for a second day on Sunday because of a pricing dispute but other buyers in Europe stepped in to snap up unsold volumes, companies and sources said and data showed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，塔塔已与和硕达成在印度泰米尔纳德邦建立 iPhone 工厂的协议
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，印度塔塔电子公司（Tata Electronics）已同意收购台湾合约制造商和硕联合科技公司（Pegatron）在印度的唯一一家 iPhone 工厂的多数股权，组建一家新的合资企业，加强塔塔作为苹果供应商的地位。【原文：India's Tata Electronics has agreed to buy a majority stake in Taiwanese contract manufacturer Pegatron's only iPhone plant in India, forming a new joint venture that strengthens Tata's position as an Apple supplier, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，华纳兄弟发现公司与 NBA 就转播权官司达成和解
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六援引知情人士的话报道，华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司已就与美国国家篮球协会（NBA）的违约诉讼达成和解。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has settled its breach of contract lawsuit against the National Basketball Association (NBA), the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Netflix 称全球有 5000 万户家庭收看了保罗与泰森的比赛
item.description: Netflix 周六发表声明称，全球有 6000 万户家庭收看了杰克-保罗和迈克-泰森之间备受瞩目的拳击比赛，该赛事的最高播放量达到 6500 万次。【原文：Netflix said on Saturday that 60 million households worldwide had tuned in for the highly anticipated boxing match between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson, and the event peaked at 65 million streams, according to a statement.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：在美国禁令的不确定性下，TikTok 母公司字节跳动的估值达到 3000 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六报道，TikTok 的中国母公司字节跳动（ByteDance）在最近提出回购要约后，对自身的估值约为 3000 亿美元。【原文：TikTok's Chinese parent company ByteDance is valuing itself at about $300 billion after a recent buyback offer, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, even as the tech giant's popular TikTok app faces the prospect of a looming ban in the U.S.】

item.title: 爱迪生公司首席执行官称，美国公用事业公司希望特朗普和共和党人拯救通胀法案
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司（Edison International）首席执行官佩德罗-皮萨罗（Pedro Pizarro）周六表示，美国公用事业行业希望即将上任的特朗普政府和共和党领导的国会保留《通货膨胀削减法案》中的清洁能源和电动汽车税收减免政策。【原文：The U.S. utility industry wants the incoming Trump administration and Republican-led Congress to preserve clean energy and EV tax credits in the Inflation Reduction Act, Pedro Pizarro, the CEO of utility Edison International said on Saturday.】

item.title: 土耳其因亚马逊 Twitch 数据泄露事件罚款 200 万里拉
item.description: 据土耳其官方通讯社（Anadolu Agency）周六报道，土耳其个人数据保护委员会（KVKK）对亚马逊网站旗下游戏平台 Twitch 的数据泄露事件处以 200 万里拉（约合 5.8 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Turkey's Personal Data Protection Board (KVKK) has fined Amazon.com's gaming platform Twitch 2 million lira ($58,000) over a data breach, the official Anadolu Agency reported on Saturday.】

item.title: OMV 称已停止从俄罗斯供应天然气
item.description: 奥地利能源公司 OMV 称，来自俄罗斯的天然气供应已于周六早上 6 点（格林尼治标准时间 5 点）结束，但监管机构称，尽管进入奥地利的天然气流量有所下降，但对客户的供应是稳定的。【原文：Austrian energy company OMV said gas deliveries from Russia had ended at 6 a.m. (0500 GMT) on Saturday, but the regulator said supplies to customers were stable despite a drop in flows into Austria.】

item.title: 特朗普助手称，英国应在贸易问题上与美国保持一致，而不是追求欧盟
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的一位高级经济顾问表示，英国应在贸易方面与美国保持一致，而不是寻求与欧盟建立更紧密的关系。【原文：A senior economic adviser to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has said Britain should align itself with the United States on trade rather than pursue closer ties with the European Union.】

item.title: 联合国气候主管要求二十国集团（G20）领导人助其一臂之力，因为融资谈判进展缓慢
item.description: 联合国气候主管周六呼吁全球最大经济体的领导人在下周于里约热内卢举行会议时发出支持全球气候融资努力的信号。【原文：The U.N.'s climate chief called on leaders of the world's biggest economies on Saturday to send a signal of support for global climate finance efforts when they meet in Rio de Janeiro next week.】

item.title: 尽管奥地利削减天然气出口，但俄罗斯通过乌克兰向欧洲的天然气出口保持稳定
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气生产商俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）表示，尽管预计对奥地利的天然气供应将因合同纠纷而削减，但该公司周六将通过乌克兰向欧洲输送 4240 万立方米天然气，与周五的输送量持平。【原文：Russian gas producer Gazprom said it would send 42.4 million cubic metres of gas to Europe via Ukraine on Saturday, the same volume as on Friday, despite expectations of gas supplies cuts to Austria over a contractual dispute.】

item.title: 美国称 Archegos 公司的 Bill Hwang 应被判处 21 年监禁
item.description: 联邦检察官周五表示，Archegos Capital Management 的创始人 Bill Hwang 应在监狱服刑 21 年，因为他实施了一项市场操纵计划，导致其价值 360 亿美元的公司破产，并使其贷款人损失了 100 多亿美元。【原文：Bill Hwang, the founder of Archegos Capital Management, should spend 21 years in prison for running a market manipulation scheme that wiped out his $36 billion firm and cost its lenders more than $10 billion, federal prosecutors said on Friday.】

item.title: Downdetector 称美国数以千计的用户无法使用 Netflix
item.description: 据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周五晚些时候，美国有数千名用户的 Netflix 出现故障。【原文：Netflix was down for thousands of users in the U.S. late on Friday, according outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，T-Mobile 在中国大规模电信网络入侵事件中遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，T-Mobile 的网络是在一次破坏性的中国网络间谍行动中被黑客入侵的系统之一，这次行动进入了多家美国和国际电信公司。【原文：T-Mobile's network was among the systems hacked in a damaging Chinese cyber-espionage operation that gained entry into multiple U.S. and international telecommunications companies, The Wall Street Journal reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 惠誉下调精神航空长期信用评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周五将美国精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）的长期信用评级从 "CCC "下调至 "CC"，使其低于北美同类低成本航空公司的评级，并警告称该公司近期可能出现违约。【原文：Fitch Ratings on Friday downgraded the long-term credit rating of Spirit Airlines to 'CC' from 'CCC', bringing it below the low-cost carrier's North America peers and warning that a near-term default appears probable.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒大股东出售几乎全部股份
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团的主要股东 ARC Global Investments 在周四提交的一份监管文件中称，该公司已将其持有的媒体公司股份几乎全部出售。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group's key shareholder, ARC Global Investments, has unloaded nearly all its stake in the media company, it said in a regulatory filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 马斯克的政治上位激起了 X 银行的救赎希望
item.description: 消息人士称，华尔街的一些银行希望很快就能卸下这位亿万富翁收购社交媒体平台 X 的 130 亿美元债务。【原文：Some Wall Street banks are hoping they may soon be able to offload $13 billion of debt that backed the billionaire's purchase of the social media platform X, sources say】

item.title: Intrum 在美国申请破产重组 45 亿美元债务
item.description: 欧洲最大的收债公司 Intrum 周五表示，它已在美国申请破产保护，以重组其债务。【原文：Intrum , Europe's biggest debt collector, on Friday said it had filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the United States in a bid to restructure its debt.】

item.title: 特朗普提高效率后，美国国防股和政府承包商下跌
item.description: 周五，国防公司和政府承包商股价走低，延续了近期的跌势，原因是当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提议成立的政府效率部存在不确定性。【原文：Shares of defense companies and government contractors were lower on Friday, extending recent losses amid uncertainty surrounding President-elect Donald Trump's proposed Department of Government Efficiency.】

item.title: 千禧年、Capula、Tudor 将比特币 ETF 纳入投资组合
item.description: 证券文件显示，包括千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）、卡普拉管理公司（Capula Management）和帝舵投资公司（Tudor Investment）在内的对冲基金在第三季度增加了对美国现货比特币交易所交易基金的投资，因为一种流行的选举驱动套利交易正在增加。【原文：Hedge funds including Millennium Management, Capula Management and Tudor Investment increased their exposure to U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds in the third quarter, securities filings showed, as a popular election-driven arbitrage trade ramped up.】
